item.title: 埃克森美孚预计第四季度上游盈利将有所缓解
item.description: 埃克森美孚周二表示，油价的变化将使其第四季度上游盈利减少 5 亿至 9 亿美元。【原文：Exxon Mobil said on Tuesday changes in oil prices would ease its fourth-quarter upstream earnings by $500 million to $900 million.】

item.title: 亚洲 收益率飙升刺破风险偏好，日本对日元发出警告
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 亚马逊称 AWS 计划在格鲁吉亚投资至少 110 亿美元建设人工智能基础设施
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）周二表示，亚马逊网络服务公司（AWS）计划投资约 110 亿美元，扩建其在格鲁吉亚的基础设施，以支持云计算和人工智能技术。【原文：Amazon.com said on Tuesday Amazon Web Services (AWS) plans to invest about $11 billion to expand its infrastructure in Georgia to support cloud computing and AI technologies.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官称公司计划与联发科合作设计台式机芯片
item.description: Nvidia 首席执行官黄仁勋周二表示，联发科将可以出售两家公司本周早些时候发布的桌面中央处理器芯片，Nvidia 对该芯片的未来计划尚未披露。【原文：Nvidia Chief Executive Jensen Huang said on Tuesday that MediaTek will be able to sell the desktop central processor chip the two companies unveiled earlier this week and that Nvidia has undisclosed future plans for the chip.】

item.title: 美国向爱沙尼亚移交 5000 万美元罚没资产以协助起诉丹斯克银行
item.description: 美国司法部周二表示，为表彰爱沙尼亚在成功起诉丹斯克银行及相关没收行动中提供的协助，美国司法部与爱沙尼亚达成了一项协议，双方将共享 5000 万美元的没收资产。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department said on Tuesday it entered an agreement to share $50 million in forfeited assets with Estonia in recognition of Estonia's assistance in the successful prosecution of Danske Bank and related forfeiture.】

item.title: 科技团体敦促美国停止限制全球使用人工智能芯片的规定
item.description: 一个科技行业组织周二敦促乔-拜登总统的政府不要在最后一刻发布一项将控制全球人工智能芯片使用权的规定，并警告说这种限制将危及美国在人工智能领域的领导地位。【原文：A technology industry group on Tuesday urged President Joe Biden's administration to refrain from issuing a last-minute rule that would control global access to AI chips, warning the restrictions would jeopardize U.S. leadership in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 美国起诉高纬环球及其他业主涉嫌协调租金价格
item.description: 美国司法部周二表示，Cushman & Wakefield 是被美国司法部起诉的六家大房东之一，被指控在房屋租赁市场存在反竞争行为。【原文：Cushman & Wakefield was among six large landlords sued by the U.S. Department of Justice over alleged anticompetitive practices in housing rental markets, the DOJ said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Itau BBA 称亚马逊、MercadoLibre 将从墨西哥进口关税中受益
item.description: Itau BBA 的分析师称，电子商务巨头亚马逊和 MercadoLibre 将从墨西哥对低成本进口商品征收的新关税中获益，超过 Shein 和 Temu 等亚洲零售商。【原文：E-commerce giants Amazon.com and MercadoLibre stand to benefit from new tariffs on low-cost imports into Mexico over Asian retailers like Shein and Temu, according to analysts at Itau BBA.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称，Anthropic 拟融资 20 亿美元，人工智能初创公司估值达 600 亿美元
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，人工智能初创公司 Anthropic 正在进行融资 20 亿美元的谈判，这笔交易将使 OpenAI 的竞争对手估值达到 600 亿美元。【原文：AI startup Anthropic is in advanced talks to raise $2 billion in a deal valuing the OpenAI rival at $60 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 华盛顿邮报》将裁员 4% 以削减成本
item.description: 华盛顿邮报》周二表示，该报将裁员约 4%，即不到 100 名员工，以削减成本，这家历史悠久的报社正在努力应对日益严重的亏损。【原文：The Washington Post said on Tuesday it would lay off about 4% of its workforce or less than 100 employees in a bid to cut costs, as the storied newspaper grapples with growing losses.】

item.title: 特朗普希望延长美国债务上限，称不希望看到美国违约
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二表示，他希望美国国会延长国家债务上限，并补充说他不希望看到联邦政府出现债务违约，目前美国的债务高达 36 万亿美元。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump said on Tuesday that he wants the U.S. Congress to extend the nation's debt ceiling, adding that he did not want to see the federal government default on its debt, which currently tops $36 trillion.】

item.title: Discovery+ 价格上涨一美元，流媒体服务今年首次涨价
item.description: 华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery）的流媒体平台 "发现+"（Discovery+）周二表示，将把月订阅价格提高 1 美元，成为新年首个提高价格的流媒体服务。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery's streaming platform Discovery+ is increasing its monthly subscription price by $1, the company said on Tuesday, becoming the first streaming service to raise rates in the new year.】

item.title: 惠誉警告：尽管共和党控制政府，美国债务上限仍将陷入僵局
item.description: 评级机构惠誉（Fitch）表示，鉴于共和党在众议院的多数席位较少，且党内在支出政策上仍存在分歧，当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）领导的统一政府不太可能迅速解决美国债务上限的争论。【原文：A unified government under President-elect Donald Trump is unlikely to lead to a quick resolution of the U.S. debt-ceiling debate given a narrow Republican House majority and continued disagreements within the party on spending policies, said ratings agency Fitch.】

item.title: 赫斯公司首席执行官对石油需求作出乐观预测，称圭亚那的石油潜力尚待挖掘
item.description: 赫斯公司首席执行官约翰-赫斯（John Hess）周二表示，尽管担心中国的需求以及美国和非欧佩克产油国产量的增加，但他认为今年的石油市场更接近于平衡，而不是供应过剩。【原文：Hess CEO John Hess on Tuesday said he sees the oil market as closer to being balanced than oversupplied this year, despite worries about demand from China and greater production from U.S. and non-OPEC producers.】

item.title: 迪士尼任命欧洲、中东和非洲地区新总裁
item.description: 华特迪士尼公司周二表示，已任命托尼-钱伯斯（Tony Chambers）为欧洲、中东和非洲地区迪士尼总裁，作为该地区娱乐业务重组的一部分。【原文：Walt Disney has named Tony Chambers president of Disney in Europe, Middle East and Africa, as part of a restructuring of its entertainment businesses in the region, the company said Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普我将在第一天撤销对广大地区的海上石油和天然气钻探禁令
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普在周二的新闻发布会上表示，他将撤销即将离任的民主党总统乔-拜登宣布的海上石油和天然气钻探禁令。【原文：U.S. President-elect Donald Trump said he will revoke an offshore oil and gas drilling ban announced by outgoing Democratic President Joe Biden, in a press conference on Tuesday.】

item.title: 伯克希尔股东寻求成立委员会监督巴菲特公司的人工智能业务
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）的一位股东希望成立一个独立董事委员会，负责监督沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）集团旗下数十家公司与人工智能相关的风险。【原文：A Berkshire Hathaway shareholder wants a committee of independent directors to oversee risks associated with artificial intelligence at the dozens of companies in Warren Buffett's conglomerate.】

item.title: 美国消费者监督机构就消费者信用准确性起诉益百利公司
item.description: 法庭记录显示，美国最高消费金融监督机构周二起诉信用评级巨头益百利公司（Experian），称该公司辜负了质疑消费信贷档案准确性的美国消费者。【原文：The top U.S. watchdog agency for consumer finance on Tuesday sued credit rating giant Experian , saying the company failed American consumers who challenge the accuracy of consumer credit files, court records show.】

item.title: 特朗普宣布向美国数据中心投资 200 亿美元
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普周二宣布投资 200 亿美元在全美各地新建数据中心。【原文：U.S. President-elect Donald Trump on Tuesday announced a $20 billion new investment to build data centers across the United States, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: Shein 代表在英国听证会上拒绝透露公司是否使用中国棉花
item.description: 周二，当英国议会委员会问及这家在线快速时尚零售商是否在其产品中使用了来自中国的棉花时，Shein 的一位代表拒绝直接回答。【原文：A Shein representative declined to provide a direct answer when asked by a British parliamentary committee on Tuesday whether the online fast-fashion retailer uses cotton from China in its products.】

item.title: 声明显示，Point72 启动新的私人信贷战略
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份内部声明，Point72 Asset Management 已聘请黑石集团（Blackstone）前高级常务董事 Todd Hirsch 来领导一项专注于快速增长的私人信贷业务的新战略。【原文：Point72 Asset Management has hired Todd Hirsch, a former senior managing director at Blackstone , to head a new strategy focused on the fast-growing private credit business, according to an internal statement seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 美国 11 月职位空缺增加，招聘人数下降
item.description: 美国 11 月份的职位空缺出乎意料地增加，但招聘人数的减少表明劳动力市场正在放缓。【原文：U.S. job openings unexpectedly increased in November, but a softening in hiring pointed to a slowing labor market.】

item.title: 美国服务业增长回升；投入品价格创近两年新高
item.description: 美国服务业活动在 12 月份加速，但一项衡量投入品支付价格的指标飙升至接近两年高点，表明通胀升高，这与美联储今年减少降息次数的预测一致。【原文：U.S. services sector activity accelerated in December, but a surge in a measure of prices paid for inputs to near a two-year high pointed to elevated inflation, consistent with the Federal Reserve's projection for fewer interest rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克的 Space X 公司如何在意大利站稳脚跟？
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）希望通过扩大其航空航天企业 Space X 和卫星宽带企业 Starlink，在意大利电信系统中占据一席之地。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk is looking to carve out a role in Italy's telecommunications system by expanding his aerospace business Space X and satellite broadband venture Starlink.】

item.title: 派拉蒙与康卡斯特续签多年转播协议
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）与康卡斯特公司（Comcast）周二表示，双方已续签分销协议，确保这家有线电视系统和服务提供商继续提供这家传媒巨头的频道，如哥伦比亚广播公司（CBS）和尼克儿童频道（Nickelodeon）。【原文：Paramount Global has renewed its distribution deal with Comcast , the companies said on Tuesday, ensuring the cable systems and services provider continues to offer the media giant's channels like CBS and Nickelodeon.】

item.title: 消息人士称，汽车市场低迷，奔驰下调利润展望
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士周二告诉路透社，由于市场长期疲软以及转向电动汽车，梅赛德斯-奔驰将下调乘用车业务的中期盈利目标。【原文：Mercedes-Benz will lower mid-term profitability targets for its passenger car business due to prolonged weakness in the market and the switch to electric-powered vehicles, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 人工智能初创企业推动风险投资回潮，2024 年美国投资额将创历史新高
item.description: PitchBook 周二发布的数据显示，人工智能初创企业为美国风险投资资金从市场低点回升做出了巨大贡献，2024 年的融资总额同比增长近 30%。【原文：Artificial intelligence startups have contributed significantly to the recovery of U.S. venture capital funding from market lows, with the total capital raised in 2024 nearly 30% higher year-on-year, according to PitchBook data released on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特斯拉就旷日持久的工会冲突寻求瑞典法院命令
item.description: 一位法院官员周二表示，特斯拉已要求瑞典一家法院确保该国交通局能够提供目前在一场更广泛的劳资冲突中被邮政工人封锁的车牌。【原文：Tesla has asked a court in Sweden to ensure that the country's Transport Agency provides access to licence plates that are currently blocked by postal workers in a wider labour conflict, a court official said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国 11 月贸易逆差扩大
item.description: 美国 11 月份的贸易赤字有所扩大，这很可能是因为企业担心当选总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁提高对外国商品的关税，因此将进口前置，从而抵消了出口飙升至历史新高的影响。【原文：The U.S. trade deficit widened in November, likely as businesses worried about President-elect Donald Trump's threats to raise tariffs on foreign goods front-loaded imports, more than offseting a surge in exports to a record high.】

item.title: 梅萨航空公司将向美国联合航空公司出售 18 架巴西航空工业公司喷气机
item.description: 梅萨航空集团（Mesa Air Group）周二表示，将以约 2.291 亿美元的价格向美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）出售 18 架巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）飞机，并将所得资金用于削减债务。【原文：Mesa Air Group will sell 18 Embraer aircraft to United Airlines for about $229.1 million and use the proceeds to cut debt, the regional airline operator said on Tuesday.】
